answers.answer: Hello,Cellulitis is an acute infection of skin and soft tissues characterized by localized pain, swelling, tenderness, erythema, and warmth. As the cellulitis has progressed to ulceration,so I would suggest you to consult a dermatologist/physician as soon as possible.Pus culture may be required along with debridement of the ulcer followed by antibiotics dressings and oral antibiotics.It is also important to get his blood sugar evaluated as diabetes often leads to foot ulcers and non healing and worsening of wounds.Hope it helps. Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional queries. Kind regards.
